data_description.endpoint: The URL of the Actual Budget server
data_description.password: The password of the Actual Budget server
data_description.encrypt_password: The encryption password of the Actual Budget file
data_description.file: The file id of the Actual Budget server
data_description.cert: The certificate of the Actual Budget server, leave blank to skip certificate validation
data_description.unit: The currency of the Actual Budget server

error.failed_file: Failed to connect: invalid file id
